autonomy.question: Did I attribute my success in pursuing personal development opportunities, such as learning new skills through online courses or self-study, solely to my own efforts and abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence as being ultimately responsible?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.
